name: Mitos y Leyendas Online
detailed_description:
Note to English-speaking audience:

First of all, thanks for the interest.
This is a 17 years old Chilean real life Trading Card Game. We're still on early development so we still don't have English support but we are eager to add it as soon as posible, so stay tuned :D

----

Battle other Guardians online leading your favorite mythological, historical and literary characters in this adaptation of the popular TCG game Myths and Legends.
Collect the cards, build the perfect strategy and crush your enemies, share your triumphs and win amazing prices.

Myths and Legends Online.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 | 8 | 10
  • Processor: Intel i3 2.0Ghz or superior
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel(R) HD Graphics 4000
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64bits Windows 7 | 8 | 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 2.4Ghz or superior
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 10+ Series, RX 570+, R9 390+
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.13.6 or newer
  • Processor: i5 2.4Ghz or superior
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD GCN-based GPU, Nvidia Kepler-based GPU or newer, Intel HD 4000 or newer (requires Metal)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card:
